nodes.text: A wrist vac was a weapon which was worn on the user's wrist. When triggered, the wrist vac released a number of small, deadly blades into a targets vital areas. Han Solo once ran into a Twi'lek bounty hunter who had one.
The Wrist Vac bears a striking similarity to the Vac Attack Mk-127, though the book does not implicitly name a model.
